1453170.name: Tricky Typing Demo
1453170.description:
This is the free Demo version of Tricky Typing. In this version, there are currently 3 Power Ups and 1 Game Mode.

Tricky Typing is a multiplayer typing game where your only input device is a controller. That's right! Each action ranging from a button press to the flick of a joystick is mapped to a letter from A - Z. (As of now, Quick Play is the only available mode, however, more modes will be available on release)

Power Ups???

- Bobot Mode: Take a second to relax while the game types for you


- Freeze!: Freeze a random opponent and stop them from being able to type


- Peek-a-Boo : Place your hands over your opponent’s eyes to temporarily blind them

Big Streaks

Rack up Streaks so high that they start covering your screen

Features

  • Customizable Dictionary: Start a match off with your own personally submitted words
  • Multiple Languages: Experience Tricky Typing in all 3 languages of the world: English, French, and Spanish
  • Dyslexic Font: If you have dyslexia, then the included font, Open Dyslexic, may be for YOU!
  • Adjustable Game Speed: Whether at half speed or 150%, play the game how you want to
1453170.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
